I started skating when I was around nine or ten years old.
And the first time that I touched a board,...
...I was like, "Wow, I want to skate, I want to skate every day..."
"...and I just wanna learn tricks and be like the boys."
My dad didn't like skateboarding at first...
...because I was skating with boys and I was the only girl.
He broke my board one day.
When he saw that I set up a new board and started skating again,...
...he was like, "There's nothing I can do."
